verbs.description: [ARG1: philly] [V: is] [ARG2: home to the hottest retail corridor in the united states] ask any philadelphian for the best place to shop in center city and they 'll probably tell you either rittenhouse or south street both of which offer a mix of independent shops big brands and specialty stores philadelphian jones lang lasalle metro center wmata station chicago philadelphia rittenhouse square center city san francisco reading terminal market philly pennsylvania convention center
